about_the_game:
This Collector's Extra pack contains extensive documentation on the creation and processes behind the making of Legend of Hand - a labour of love over three years! Also included is unseen art and music which didn't make it into the final game.

Includes:

- 30 page artbook, featuring art used in the game as well as many original drawings and paintings inspired by the characters of Legend of Hand
- A 3000 word essay that provides an insight into the making of the game
- 14 additional music tracks that didn't make it into the final game

The track listing is as follows:

1. Alternative End Credits 01:29
2. Chef's Disco 01:17
3. Clown Loop 00:13
4. Credits No Beat 01:30
5. Danger Convo 00:37
6. Fishtickler Don't Cry 01:32
7. Heated Thoughts 01:06
8. Heroic Boogie 02:27
9. Pensive Chef 03:35
10. Poig 00:19
11. Queezy 00:32
12. Sifight 01:01
13. Sutn 00:28
14. Wretched Nerves Original 01:18

The files will be installed locally in your Legend of Hand folder within the Steam folder, for example: C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Legend of Hand\Collector's Extras
